head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FIELD, FLORENCE FOLKENFLIK (NEE ROGOSIN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FIELD, FLORENCE FOLKENFLIK (NEE ROGOSIN)

block.p: FIELD - Florence Folkenflik (nee Rogosin) on January 2nd, 1997 in Laguna Hills, CA, following an extended illness. Beloved wife of Herb Field and the late Bernard Folkenflik. Loving mother of Robert Folkenflik (Vivian), Bette Folkenflik Blank and Max Folkenflik (Margaret) and loving stepmother of Priscilla Field. Dear sister of H. Rogie Rogosin (Donna) and the late George Rogosin (Frances). Devoted grandmother of six grandchildren and one step-grandchild. We will all miss you.

FIELD - Florence Folkenflik (nee Rogosin) on January 2nd, 1997 in Laguna Hills, CA, following an extended illness. Beloved wife of Herb Field and the late Bernard Folkenflik. Loving mother of Robert Folkenflik (Vivian), Bette Folkenflik Blank and Max Folkenflik (Margaret) and loving stepmother of Priscilla Field. Dear sister of H. Rogie Rogosin (Donna) and the late George Rogosin (Frances). Devoted grandmother of six grandchildren and one step-grandchild. We will all miss you.
